description: When the weather cools, people tend to crave pumpkin-spiced lattes. You can also add a boozy kick by sprinkling it with vodka or rum.&nbsp;Kahlua has a full-bodied, rich, sweet flavor with notes of vanilla and caramel on the finish. It pairs well with vodka, which has a clean black peppercorn spice and a faint brown bread flavor.
keywords: How To Make Pumpkin Spice Latte
name: Pumpkin Spice Latte

recipeInstructions.name: Combine all the ingredients in a shaker or vessel with a lid and plenty of ice.
recipeInstructions.text: Combine all the ingredients in a shaker or vessel with a lid and plenty of ice.

recipeInstructions.name: Shake for 15 to 20 seconds to create a smooth, velvety foam.
recipeInstructions.text: Shake for 15 to 20 seconds to create a smooth, velvety foam.

recipeInstructions.name: Strain into a glass, being careful not to lose the lovely foam.
